short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stackcrawler is a website platform checker that checks tech stacks of websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stackcrawler Website Platform Checker helps developers, designers, and tech enthusiasts find the technology stacks behind any website.

Stackcrawler Chrome extension can detect CMS, e-commerce platforms, hosting providers, website builders, WordPress plugins, CDNs, and many more.

With just a few clicks, Stackcrawler provides detailed insights into the website platforms used to build and run any website.
